flexiable-gpt.prompts.description:
A list of custom prompts when text is selected. If no text is selected, they will error out. 
 The name is just for display purposes.  The prompt sent to the AI services is '{prompt} \n\n {Selected Text};.  The behavior indicats what to do with the generated content should be replace, prefix, or postfix.

name.description: The display name of the prompt

prompt.description: The start of the prompt that will be delivered to the AI service.  The prompt to the AI services is '{prompt} \n\n {Selected Text}

behavior.description: Where does the AI generated content go in relation to the selected text?

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
